meanings.sent1: I was trowing that the sun would come out soon.
meanings.sent2: She trowed that her friend would arrive early.
meanings.sent3: While trowing about the future, he forgot to enjoy the present.
meanings.sent4: Her trowing was like a compass guiding her decisions.
meanings.sent5: Trowing helped him navigate through uncertain times.

meanings.sent1: He was trowing the ball to his friend in the park.
meanings.sent2: She trowed the stone into the pond, creating ripples.
meanings.sent3: The magician was trowing cards into the audience, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her trowing of paint on the canvas created a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Trowing the dice determined the next player's turn in the game.

meanings.sent1: I am trowing that it will rain later today.
meanings.sent2: She trowed that the answer to the riddle was hidden in the book.
meanings.sent3: While trowing the number of jellybeans in the jar, she won the contest.
meanings.sent4: His trowing about the outcome of the match was surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent5: Trowing the correct password unlocked the secret door.
